column1: #Text=# MeanSum: A Model for Unsupervised Neural Multi-Document Abstractive Summarization
#Text=##### Create directories that aren't part of the Git repo (checkpoints/, outputs/):
#Text=cause texts from writer.add_text() to not show up.
#Text=Download Yelp data: https://www.yelp.com/dataset and place files in ```datasets/yelp_dataset/```
#Text=Run script to pre-process script and create train, val, test splits:
#Text=Download subword tokenizer built on Yelp and place in
#Text=reference summary written by the Mechanical Turk worker.
#Text=This will output and save the automated metrics.
#Text=NOTE: Unlike some conventions, 'gpus' option here represents the GPU ID (the one which is visible) and NOT the number of GPUs.
#Text=Hence, for a machine with a single GPU, you will give gpus=0
#Text=Training summarization model (using pre-trained language model and default hyperparams).
#Text=The automated metrics results will be in ```checkpoints/sum/mlstm/yelp/<hparams>_<additional_notes>```.:
